title: BizForge AI – Branding & Marketing Platform

requirements.text: Create a Brand Name Generator tool that accepts three inputs — Industry, Main Keywords, and Brand Tone — and returns 15 unique, creative, short (1–2 word), easy-to-pronounce, modern brand name suggestions as a numbered list. The generation logic must avoid generic terms like 'Tech', 'Solutions', or 'Company'.

quotes: Generate 15 unique, creative, and memorable brand names.

acceptanceCriteria: User can enter Industry, Keywords, and Brand Tone in a form
Submitting the form produces a numbered list of 15 brand name suggestions
Generated names are short (1–2 words), avoid generic terms, and reflect the provided inputs

requirements.text: Create a Logo Concept Generator tool that accepts Brand Name, Industry, and Brand Personality/Tone as inputs and returns a detailed logo concept description including: logo style, suggested primary and secondary colors, icon or symbol concept, font style recommendation, and background style suggestion.

quotes: Create a detailed logo concept for the following brand:

Include:
- Logo style
- Suggested primary and secondary colors
- Icon or symbol concept
- Font style recommendation
- Background style suggestion

acceptanceCriteria: User can enter Brand Name, Industry, and Brand Personality inputs
Output includes all five required sections: logo style, colors, icon concept, font recommendation, background style
Output is clearly structured so a designer can act on it

requirements.text: Create a Marketing Content Generator tool that accepts Brand Name, Product/Service Description, Target Audience, and Tone as inputs and returns: (1) a 150-word product description, (2) a short advertisement copy, and (3) three Instagram captions with hashtags. All content must be persuasive, engaging, and include a strong call-to-action.

quotes:
Generate:
1. A 150-word product description
2. A short advertisement copy
3. 3 Instagram captions with hashtags

acceptanceCriteria: User can input Brand Name, Description, Audience, and Tone
Output contains three labeled sections: product description (~150 words), ad copy, and three Instagram captions
Each caption includes relevant hashtags and a call-to-action

requirements.text: Create a Sentiment Analysis tool where the user can paste a customer review text. The tool classifies the sentiment as Positive, Negative, or Neutral and provides a 1–2 sentence explanation of why.

quotes:
Classify the sentiment as:
- Positive
- Negative
- Neutral

Then provide a brief explanation (1–2 sentences).

acceptanceCriteria: User can input free-form review text
Output clearly labels the sentiment as Positive, Negative, or Neutral
Output includes a 1–2 sentence explanation justifying the classification

requirements.text: Create a Color Palette Generator tool that accepts Industry and Brand Personality/Tone as inputs and returns a professional color palette with: 1 primary color (HEX), 2 secondary colors (HEX), 1 accent color (HEX), and a brief emotional meaning explanation for each color.

quotes:
Provide:
- 1 Primary Color (HEX code)
- 2 Secondary Colors (HEX codes)
- 1 Accent Color (HEX code)
- Brief explanation of emotional meaning of each color

acceptanceCriteria: User can enter Industry and Brand Personality
Output shows 4 colors with their HEX codes and visual color swatches
Each color is accompanied by a brief emotional meaning explanation

requirements.text: Create an AI Branding Chatbot interface named 'BizForge AI' where users can type any business or branding question and receive structured responses including an explanation, practical steps, and real-world marketing tips. Responses must avoid generic answers.

quotes: You are BizForge AI, a professional branding and marketing consultant.

Provide:
- Structured explanation
- Practical steps
- Real-world marketing tips
- Avoid generic answers

acceptanceCriteria: User can type a branding or business question into a chat-style interface
BizForge AI responds with a structured answer containing explanation, steps, and marketing tips
Chat history is displayed in a readable conversation format

requirements.text: Add a Voice Input feature that records the user's speech, converts it to text, and automatically passes the converted text into the BizForge AI Branding Chatbot for processing and a professional branding response.

quotes: Once speech is converted to text, pass it into:

Process the following request and provide a professional branding response:
User Request: {converted_text}

acceptanceCriteria: A microphone/voice input button is visible in the BizForge AI chatbot interface
Clicking it starts recording the user's speech
On completion, the speech is converted to text and submitted as a chatbot query
The chatbot returns a branding-focused response based on the transcribed text

requirements.text: Design the overall application with a sleek, dark-themed branding studio aesthetic — think deep charcoal/near-black backgrounds, warm gold and amber accent colors, crisp white typography, and subtle gradient highlights. The layout should use a sidebar navigation to switch between the 7 tools, with each tool presented as a clean card-based workspace. Typography should feel premium and editorial.
acceptanceCriteria: Application uses a consistent dark theme with gold/amber accents throughout
Sidebar navigation allows switching between all 7 tools
Each tool section is visually distinct but cohesively styled
Typography and spacing convey a premium, professional branding studio feel

constraints: All AI/LLM-style generation must be simulated deterministically on the backend using Motoko rule-based logic — no external AI API calls
Voice input must use the browser's Web Speech API (no external speech services)
All frontend immutable paths must not be modified
nonGoals: Integration with real AI/LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
User authentication or saved project history
Email or social media posting integrations

required: BizForge AI wordmark logo — bold stylized text with an abstract forge/flame icon in gold on a dark background (bizforge-logo.dim_400x120.png)
Hero background texture — dark charcoal abstract geometric pattern with subtle gold gradient highlights, suitable for app header (hero-bg.dim_1440x320.png)
